site.title: Southside Pharmacy | Refills, Vaccines, Delivery
site.description: Friendly neighborhood pharmacy offering fast refills, vaccinations, and local delivery.

props.headline: Refills and care—right around the corner.
props.subheadline: Fast prescriptions, walk-in vaccines, and local delivery from your neighborhood team.

items.title: Prescription refills
items.description: Quick refills with text reminders and easy transfers.

items.title: Vaccinations
items.description: Flu, COVID, shingles, and more—walk-ins welcome.

items.title: Local delivery
items.description: Convenient delivery options for qualifying neighborhoods.

props.headline: A pharmacy that knows your name
props.content: Southside Pharmacy is a locally owned, independent pharmacy focused on personal service. We work closely with your providers, answer questions clearly, and help you stay on track with your medications.

items.quote: They always have my refill ready and take the time to explain everything.
items.author: Maria R.

items.quote: Walked in for a flu shot—super friendly and fast.
items.author: James T.

items.quote: Delivery made it so much easier for my parents. Great service.
items.author: Anika S.

items.question: Can you transfer my prescription from another pharmacy?
items.answer: Yes. Share your current pharmacy info and we’ll handle the transfer for you.

items.question: Do you accept walk-ins for vaccines?
items.answer: Often yes. Availability varies—contact us to confirm same-day options.

items.question: How does delivery work?
items.answer: We offer local delivery in select areas. Ask about eligibility and timing when you contact us.

items.question: What insurance plans do you accept?
items.answer: We accept most major plans. If you’re unsure, contact us and we’ll verify coverage.

props.headline: Need a refill or vaccine today?
props.subheadline: Send a quick message and our team will follow up shortly.
